query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,COUNT(A.PJT) AS RNQ_R FROM ( SELECT A.PJT,A.HNO,A.MDT, B.CS126_GNO, B.CS126_SLA ,A.BSU ,A.ARA
FROM ( SELECT A.CS172_PJO PJT ,A.CS172_HNO HNO ,MAX(A.CS172_ARA ) ARA ,MAX(A.CS172_BSU) BSU ,MAX(A.CS172_MDT) MDT ,A.CS172_YYM YYM ,MAX(C.CS126_UMR) UMR
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS172_PJO = B.PJT AND A.CS172_HNO = B.HNO AND B.EXC = ''
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS172_PJO = C.CS126_PJT AND A.CS172_HNO = C.CS126_HNO AND C.CS126_DDT = '' AND C.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS172_MDT >= C.CS126_UMR
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS172_MDT BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,4)||'0101' AND #GDATE# AND SUBSTR(A.CS172_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C')
GROUP BY A.CS172_PJO , A.CS172_HNO, A.CS172_YYM
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.CS126_PJT AND A.HNO = B.CS126_HNO AND A.UMR = B.CS126_UMR AND B.CS126_DDT = '' AND B.CS126_PST = 'A6'
WHERE VALUE(B.CS126_SLA,'N') = 'N'
) AS A
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET RNQ_R = B.RNQ_R
